showScoreExcerpt:
“It has none of the grit of the Grimm tale, the sweetness of the Disney movie or the grace of the Rodgers and Hammerstein musical. Instead, it’s surprisingly vulgar, sexed-up and dumbed-down: a parade of hustling women in bustiers and shirtless pec-rippling hunks.”
